original: Andersson, Karl Emil, hemmansägare, fd. riksdagsman, Doverstorp, f. 10/8/69 i Risinge, östergötl. 1., av nämndem. Anders Petter A. o. Johanna Hansson. G. 95 m. Karolina Johnsson. Barn: Helena f. 96, Elsa 99. — Genomg. folkhögsk. o. Karlskoga prakt. sik. Äg. egend. Bliantorp i Finspång. Led. av riksd. andra kamm. 18-20, av första 21-32, statsrev. 29-30, led. av 1936 års kyrkomöte, av 1929 års vägkomm., fortsättn :komm. o. prästvafekomm., av landstinget sed-. 17, av dess förv:utsk., av styr. f. östergötl. Ensk. Bank A-B Finspångs-kont., av trafikförvaltn. f. östergötl. smalspår. järnv., nämndeman 96-01, v. ordf. i komm:fuHm., ordf. i fattigv:-styr. 09-12, pens:styr. omb. 14-25. RNO, RVO.
translated: Andersson, Karl Emil, farmer, former member of parliament, from Doverstorp, born on August 10th, 1869 in Risinge, Östergötland, Sweden, son of councilor Anders Petter A. and Johanna Hansson. Married in 1895 to Karolina Johnsson. Children: Helena born in 1896, Elsa in 1899. Completed studies at a folk high school and Karlskoga's practical school. Owner of the property Bliantorp in Finspång. Member of the second chamber of the parliament from 1918-1920, and the first chamber from 1921-1932, the state auditor from 1929-1930, and a member of the 1936 church meeting, the 1929 road committee, continuing committee, and priest election committee. Member of the county council since 1917, of the administrative committee, board of directors for the Östergötland Private Bank AB Finspång branch, the traffic board for Östergötland narrow-gauge railways, jury member from 1896-1901, deputy chairman of the municipal committee, chairman of the poor board from 1909-1912, and representative of the pension board from 1914-1925. Recipient of RNO and RVO honors.
